item.title: A guided tour of classification metrics
item.description: Accuracy, precision, recall, and F1-score are metrics used to assess automatic classifiers. These metrics are calculated from a confusion matrix. Say we have spam filter which tells whether a mail is spam or not. With a test dataset of 100 spam emails and 900 non-spam, we get the following results. Actual class: Spam Actual class: Non-spam Prediction class: Spam 85 100 Prediction class: Non-spam 15 800 This confusion matrix shows the confusions the system makes in its predictions.
